## Type of Issue

Please select the type of issue:

- [ ] **Broken Link** - Link returns 404 or incorrect destination
- [ ] **Incorrect Information** - Technical inaccuracy or outdated content
- [ ] **Formatting Error** - Markdown rendering or display issues
- [ ] **Missing Content** - Incomplete or missing sections
- [ ] **Code Error** - Code example doesn't work
- [ ] **Image Issue** - Missing, broken, or incorrect image
- [ ] **Navigation Issue** - Broken breadcrumbs or menu links
- [ ] **Other** - Please specify: _______________
